title: Correlate Power Outage with Traffic Signal Failure
description: A series of traffic signals go dark. An operator must determine if this is related to a power grid failure.

tasks.description: Receive multiple alerts for traffic signal failures in the same geographic area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a cluster of signal outages.

tasks.description: Overlay the locations of the failed signals with the real-time power grid status map.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent visually correlates the two datasets on a map.

tasks.description: Confirm that the signal failures perfectly match a known power outage zone, identifying the root cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly diagnoses the problem as a power outage, not a traffic system failure.
